roleset.name: constricting of a blood vessel

role.descr: entity constricted (explicit blood vessel or patient)

example.name: vasoconstrict-v
example.text: for the most part, sympathetic stim. causes arterioles of vascular beds to vasoconstrict (hence the increase in blood pressure).

example.name: vasoconstriction-n
example.text: Local platelet activation causes vasoconstriction of large epicardial canine coronary arteries in vivo.
example.arg: of large epicardial canine coronary arteries

roleset.note: VASOCONSTRICTION-N NOTES: Relation to verb-constrict.01. (from vasoconstriction.01-n)
